ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s a female ogre warrior. He was working on a wood elf warrior (no clue why that race/class combo Same reason I have a Gnome Warrior.  To be
ygData.messageBody:
"I think it's a female ogre warrior. He was working on a wood elf warrior
(no
clue why that race/class combo"

Same reason I have a Gnome Warrior. To be different. Wouldn't it be great
if every warrior, and every other class for that matter, were all the same
race? My Gnome Warrior does fine has 179 str self buffed 1030+AC 1000+ atk
and in my opinion the difference in performance is negligible. Plus there
is nothing like tanking that HUGE giant or even one of those Tree's in PoG.
Or the ultimate satisfaction is when some snot nosed Ogre/Troll/Barbarian
starts talking trash about how much a Gnome Warrior must suck only to
receive thier beat down and humiliation of losing to a Gnome of all things,
I love it.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 10:33 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


Well, you did say quests - but i thought i would just toss this out....

A 60 cleric (in my guild) using 3 PC's & 4 char's (clr, sha, ench & war)
PL'd his war to 60 in 7 days /played.

I think it's a female oger warrior. He was working on a wood elf warrior (no
clue why that race/class combo) then scrapped it - told us to sac him down
from 53 (i think) when he decided to restart.

PL'ing melee classes typically invovles enough melee (imagine that) so that
you don't really fall to far behind on melee skills (offense, defense, 1HS,
1HB, etc.) if at all. Caster classes on the other hand..... well, when we
see ppl practice casting spells on them selves or what not to buld skill -
we call it "magerbating" ;)

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Troubadour, somewhere on Innoruuk...



-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 9:18 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest

Gah - if I can ever teach one thing to new players, it's this:

NEVER EVER POWER-LEVEL ON QUESTS ALONE.

If you want to be worth a darned at all, it is very important that you
practice ALL of your skills from day one.


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
